actions.text: Amendment SA 2970 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 2970 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Sununu. (consideration: CR S2491-2493, S2499; text: CR S2492) To revise the time period for Internet availability in the provisions relating to earmarks and availability of conference reports from 24 hours to 48 hours.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2970 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2970 proposed by Senator Lott for Senator Sununu.

purpose: To revise the time period for Internet availability in the provisions relating to earmarks and availability of conference reports from 24 hours to 48 hours.
